createTicket.description: Creates a new ticket in JIRA with specified details

fetchTickets.description: Retrieves tickets from a specified JIRA project

parameters.maxResults: Maximum number of tickets to fetch

getTicket.description: Retrieves a specific JIRA ticket by its ID or key

parameters.issueIdOrKey: ID or key of the JIRA ticket

searchUsers.description: Search for users in JIRA by name, email, or account ID.

parameters.query: Search query for user name or email
parameters.maxResults: Maximum number of users to return
parameters.accountId: Specific JIRA user account ID to search for

assignTicket.description: Assign a JIRA ticket to a specific user or unassign it.

parameters.issueIdOrKey: ID or key of the JIRA ticket
parameters.accountId: JIRA user account ID to assign the ticket to (or null to unassign)
